format: A data frame with 449 observations on the following 20 variables.

parameters.csa_name: a factor with levels Raleigh-Durham-Cary, NC
parameters.poc: A numeric vector, the Parameter Occurance Code.
parameters.units: A character vector with value ug/m3 LC.
parameters.state: A character vector with value North Carolina.
parameters.site_latitude: A numeric vector of the latitude.
parameters.cbsa_name: A character vector with value Durham, NC.
parameters.daily_mean_pm2_5_concentration: A numeric vector with the average daily concentration of fine particulates, or particulate matter 2.5.
parameters.county: A character vector with value Durham.
parameters.aqs_parameter_desc: A factor with levels PM2.5 - Local Conditions and Acceptable PM2.5 AQI & Speciation Mass.
parameters.site_longitude: A numeric vector of the longitude.
parameters.daily_aqi_value: A numeric vector with the daily air quality index.

description:
Description
Daily air quality is measured by the air quality index (AQI) reported by the
Environmental Protection Agency in 2011.
title: Air quality for Durham, NC
